languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next ranged attack or psychic staff {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} inflicts a {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effect on all targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. The type of this effect depends on the attack's damage type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Physical damage{/g}: inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energy damage{/g}: inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}</indent>
The level of this damage-over-time effect is equal to <u>(minimum weapon damage / 7)</u>.
This effect is only applied once per target after all other effects from the attack are applied.

traits.locale_text:
Next Ranged weapon attack or Psychic staff ability applies a DoT effect to all targets hit, depending on the weapon damage type:
- Physical damage: applies Toxin
- Energy damage: applies Burning
Damage of the DoT effect is (Weapon Minimal Damage / 7).
This effect applies only once per target at the end of attack sequence.

The Executioner's next ranged weapon attack or psychic staff ability applies a damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} to all targets hit. The type of this effect depends on the weapon damage type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Physical damage{/g}: applies {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energy damage{/g}: applies {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}</indent>
The level of this damage-over-time effect is equal to <u>(weapon minimal damage / 7)</u>.
This effect is applied only once per target after all other effects of the attack are applied.

The Executioner's next ranged weapon attack or psychic staff ability applies a damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} to all targets hit. The type of this effect depends on the weapon damage type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Physical damage{/g}: applies {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energy damage{/g}: applies {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}</indent>
The level of this damage-over-time effect is equal to <u>(weapon minimal damage / 7)</u>.
This effect is applied only once per target after all other effects of the attack are applied.

The Executioner's next ranged attack or psychic staff ability inflicts a damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on all targets hit. The type of this effect depends on the attack's damage type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Physical damage{/g}: inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energy damage{/g}: inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}</indent>
The level of this damage-over-time effect is equal to <u>(minimum weapon damage / 7)</u>.
This effect is only applied once per target after all other effects from the attack are applied.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next ranged attack or psychic staff {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} inflicts a {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effect on all targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. The type of this effect depends on the attack's damage type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Physical damage{/g}: inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energy damage{/g}: inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}</indent>
The level of this damage-over-time effect is equal to <u>(minimum weapon damage / 7)</u>.
This effect is only applied once per target after all other effects from the attack are applied.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next ranged attack or psychic staff {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} inflicts a {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effect on all targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. The type of this effect depends on the attack's damage type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Physical damage{/g}: inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energy damage{/g}: inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}</indent>
The level of this damage-over-time effect is equal to <u>(minimum weapon damage / 7)</u>.
This effect is only applied once per target after all other effects from the attack are applied.

languages.text:
El próximo ataque a distancia o {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de báculo psíquico del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} inflige un efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} continuado a todos los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g}. Este efecto depende del tipo de daño del ataque:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Daño físico{/g}: inflige {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Daño elemental{/g}: inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}</indent>
El nivel de este efecto de daño continuado es igual a <u>(daño mínimo del arma / 7)</u>.
Este efecto solo se aplica una vez por objetivo después de aplicar todos los demás efectos del ataque.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next ranged attack or psychic staff {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} inflicts a {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effect on all targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. The type of this effect depends on the attack's damage type:

The level of this damage-over-time effect is equal to <u>(minimum weapon damage / 7)</u>.

El próximo ataque a distancia o {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de báculo psíquico del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} inflige un efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} continuado a todos los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g}. Este efecto depende del tipo de daño del ataque:

-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Daño elemental{/g}: inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}</indent>
El nivel de este efecto de daño continuado es igual a <u>(daño mínimo del arma / 7)</u>.
Este efecto solo se aplica una vez por objetivo después de aplicar todos los demás efectos del ataque.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の次の範囲攻撃または超能力の杖{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}命中{/g}したすべてのターゲットに対して、継続{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。この効果の種類は、攻撃のダメージタイプに依存する：
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}身体的ダメージ{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}を付与する</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}を付与する</indent>
継続ダメージ効果のレベルは、<u>(最低武器ダメージ / 7)</u>に等しくなる。
この効果はターゲット1体につき1回のみ、攻撃による他の効果すべてが適用された後に適用される。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next ranged attack or psychic staff {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} inflicts a {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effect on all targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. The type of this effect depends on the attack's damage type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Physical damage{/g}: inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energy damage{/g}: inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}</indent>
The level of this damage-over-time effect is equal to <u>(minimum weapon damage / 7)</u>.
This effect is only applied once per target after all other effects from the attack are applied.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の次の範囲攻撃または超能力の杖{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}命中{/g}したすべてのターゲットに対して、継続{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。この効果の種類は、攻撃のダメージタイプに依存する：
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}身体的ダメージ{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}を付与する</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}を付与する</indent>
継続ダメージ効果のレベルは、<u>(最低武器ダメージ / 7)</u>に等しくなる。
この効果はターゲット1体につき1回のみ、攻撃による他の効果すべてが適用された後に適用される。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}的下次远程攻击或灵能法杖{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，会对所有受影响的目标施加持续{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}效果。持续伤害效果类别取决于攻击的伤害类型。
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}物理伤害{/g}：造成{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}：造成{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果。</indent>
持续伤害效果的强度等级等同于<u>（最小武器伤害/7）</u>。
此效果会在所有其他效果生效之后，对每个受影响的目标生效一次。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next ranged attack or psychic staff {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} inflicts a {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effect on all targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. -<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energy damage{/g}: inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}</indent>
The level of this damage-over-time effect is equal to <u>(minimum weapon damage / 7)</u>.
This effect is only applied once per target after all other effects from the attack are applied.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}的下次远程攻击或灵能法杖{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，会对所有受影响的目标施加持续{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}效果。持续伤害效果类别取决于攻击的伤害类型。
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}物理伤害{/g}：造成{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}：造成{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果。</indent>
持续伤害效果的强度等级等同于<u>（最小武器伤害/7）</u>。
此效果会在所有其他效果生效之后，对每个受影响的目标生效一次。

languages.text:
Der nächste Fernkampfangriff oder die nächste Psionischer-Stab-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henkers{/g} belegt alle {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffenen{/g} Ziele mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}-über-Zeit-Effekt. Der Typ dieses Effektes basiert auf dem Schadenstyp des Angriffs:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Physischer Schaden{/g}: bewirkt {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g}: bewirkt {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}</indent>
Die Stufe dieses Schaden-über-Zeit-Effektes entspricht <u>(minimalem Waffenschaden / 7)</u>.
Dieser Effekt wird nur einmal pro Ziel angewandt, nachdem alle anderen Effekte des Angriffs angewandt wurden.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next ranged attack or psychic staff {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} inflicts a {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effect on all targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. The type of this effect depends on the attack's damage type:

Der Typ dieses Effektes basiert auf dem Schadenstyp des Angriffs:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Physischer Schaden{/g}: bewirkt {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g}: bewirkt {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}</indent>

Dieser Effekt wird nur einmal pro Ziel angewandt, nachdem alle anderen Effekte des Angriffs angewandt wurden.

languages.text:
La prochaine attaque à distance ou {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de bâton psychique de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} inflige un effet de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} progressifs à toutes les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g}. L'effet infligé dépend du type de dégâts de l'attaque :
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Dégâts physiques{/g} : inflige {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Dégâts d'énergie{/g} : inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}</indent>
Le niveau de l'effet de dégâts progressifs est égal à <u>(dégâts minimum de l'arme / 7)</u>.
Cet effet ne s'applique qu'une fois par cible une fois tous les autres effets de l'attaque appliqués.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next ranged attack or psychic staff {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} inflicts a {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effect on all targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. The type of this effect depends on the attack's damage type:

-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Dégâts d'énergie{/g} : inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}</indent>
Le niveau de l'effet de dégâts progressifs est égal à <u>(dégâts minimum de l'arme / 7)</u>.
Cet effet ne s'applique qu'une fois par cible une fois tous les autres effets de l'attaque appliqués.

languages.text:
Следующая дистанционная атака или {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} пси-посоха, применяемая {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палачом{/g}, накладывает эффект периодического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} на все цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}. Тип эффекта определяется типом урона от атаки:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}физический урон{/g}: накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Энергетический урон{/g}: накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}</indent>
Уровень эффекта равен <u>(минимальный урон оружия / 7)</u>.
Этот эффект применяется к одной цели не больше одного раза и только после применения всех остальных эффектов атаки.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next ranged attack or psychic staff {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} inflicts a {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effect on all targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. Следующая дистанционная атака или {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} пси-посоха, применяемая {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палачом{/g}, накладывает эффект периодического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} на все цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}. Тип эффекта определяется типом урона от атаки:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}физический урон{/g}: накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Энергетический урон{/g}: накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}</indent>
Уровень эффекта равен <u>(минимальный урон оружия / 7)</u>.
Этот эффект применяется к одной цели не больше одного раза и только после применения всех остальных эффектов атаки.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat{/g}'ın bir sonraki menzilli saldırısı veya ruhsezi asası {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğu{/g} tüm hedeflerde zamanla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} veren bir etki oluşturur. Bu etkinin türü, saldırganın hasar türüne bağlıdır:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}Fiziksel hasar{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toksin{/g} oluşturur</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Enerji hasarı{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Yanma{/g} oluşturur</indent>
Bu zamanla hasar veren etkinin seviyesi, <u>(minimum silah hasarı / 7)</u> kadardır.
Bu etki, her hedefe saldırının diğer tüm etkileri uygulandıktan sonra yalnızca bir kez uygulanır.
languages.original_text:

The type of this effect depends on the attack's damage type:

-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energy damage{/g}: inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}</indent>
The level of this damage-over-time effect is equal to <u>(minimum weapon damage / 7)</u>.
This effect is only applied once per target after all other effects from the attack are applied.
